column3: nutrient-filled breakfast! I liked the fact that the size of our food was perfect
column4: enough to make everyone full and happy. However
column5: I thought the price could be a little lower
column6: since we could probably get a bigger portion had we gone to a different breakfast place. Easy parking was another bonus! Our waitress brought out one bill but was willing to split it accordingly to our preference
column7: so we appreciated the service. Will make it back another time to try the extensive cocktail menu!
